channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游릭 18:29 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Follow the following messages.
item.description: 游릭 18:29 Flow to the Zaporizhzhia Oblast. Follow the following messages.#Zaporizhia_ This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
